articles.content: The Wisconsin Badgers are set to compete against the Oklahoma State Cowboys in the Guaranteed Rate Bowl on Tuesday, where fans may get the first peek at younger talent to wrap up a tumultuous 2022 se… [+3669 chars]

articles.author: James Crepea | The Oregonian/OregonLive
articles.title: Projected Oregon Ducks depth chart for Holiday Bowl - OregonLive
articles.description: With three defenders opting out of the game to prepare for the NFL Draft and 15 players entering the transfer portal, the Ducks will have a considerably smaller roster than during the regular season.
